solid_waste_aerobic_bioreactor.description: First stage recovery of wastewater, using microbial degradation. Isolates nutrients from urine.

urine_recycling_processor_VCD.description: First stage recovery of urine, both that captured directly and as isolated from wastewater.

multifiltration_purifier_post_treatment.description: Second stage recovery of urine, producing relatively clean water following VCD.

oxygen_generation_SFWE.description: Generates oxygen through electrolysis of water.

co2_reduction_sabatier.description: Reduces carbon dioxide without requiring venting.

co2_removal_SAWD.description: Moves carbon dioxide from the habitat atmosphere to co2_storage.

co2_makeup_valve.description: Vents carbon dioxide from co2_storage into the habitat atmosphere.

dehumidifier.description: Converts free water vapor into potable water.

ch4_removal_agent.description: Vents methane from the habitat, removing it from the system.

crew_habitat_sam.description: The crew module of SAM, the Space Analog of the Moon and Mars at Biosphere 2 in Oracle, Arizona

greenhouse_sam.description: The greenhouse of SAM, the Space Analog of the Moon and Mars at Biosphere 2 in Oracle, Arizona

atmosphere_equalizer.description: Balances the atmosphere elements of habitat & greenhouse every step.

b2_sun.description: Sunlight available to plants in the greenhouse_b2

co2_storage.description: Stores co2 from co2_removal_sawd, released by co2_makeup_valve
